snippet.title: Technology Play MP3s on cassette with FlashTrax
snippet.description: * IDG MP3 tunes are great when youre hooked to your PC or if you have a portable player. snippet.title: How to turn your LPs into CDs or MP3s
snippet.description:
* If you're a music fan, you probably already know that you can turn tracks from a store-bought CD into digital MP3 files. But if you still haven't left the analog age of vinyl LPs or cassettes behind, don't fret: You too can enjoy the fun of making your albums into CDs or putting them into an MP3...

snippet.title: How MP3 works
snippet.description:
* IDG MP3 MPEG1, Layer 3 a compression standard that creates relatively small digital audio files with highfidelity sound. Highquality digital sound. Small file sizes. Most widely accepted digital audio standard. No system for protecting copyrights.
http://www.cnn.com/2000/TECH/computing/02/03/mp3.works.idg/index.html

snippet.title: Zoom brings more muscle to everyday audio
snippet.description:
* MP3 players and cell phones are fine for recording the occasional voice memo, but recording a music recital or broadcast-quality interview requires a product with more muscle. The Zoom H2 is not the smallest or best-sounding mobile audio recorder we've come across, but with an unbeatable street price of about $200 and a d...
